reason.raw: New implementation based on branch `server_caguero` will be submitted.
reason.html: New implementation based on branch server_caguero will be submitted.

description.raw:
This pull request introduces the Server class and its designed test unit to the default branch. The Server class contains functionality to handle communication between Server and multiple agents using TCP protocol and multithreading architecture.
In order to test the module, a sample agent was implemented in which the agent sends a sample action message to the server. In reply, the server sends back a sample sense message to the agent. The sample action and sense message is given in the format and length of the robocup simulation messages.
description.html: This pull request introduces the Server class and its designed test unit to the default branch. The Server class contains functionality to handle communication between Server and multiple agents using TCP protocol and multithreading architecture. In order to test the module, a sample agent was implemented in which the agent sends a sample action message to the server. In reply, the server sends back a sample sense message to the agent. The sample action and sense message is given in the format and length of the robocup simulation messages.
